languages.text: Плащ из дорогой ткани, украшенный печатями чистоты с молитвами о спасении праведных.
This cloak made of expensive fabric is adorned with purity seals bearing prayers of salvation for the righteous.
languages.original_text: Плащ из дорогой ткани, украшенный печатями чистоты с молитвами о спасении праведных.

traits.locale_text: This cloak made of expensive fabric is adorned with purity seals bearing prayers of salvation for the righteous.
This cloak made of expensive fabric is adorned with purity seals bearing prayers of salvation for the righteous.

This cloak made of expensive fabric is adorned with purity seals bearing prayers of salvation for the righteous.
This cloak made of expensive fabric is adorned with purity seals bearing prayers of salvation for the righteous.

languages.text: Cette cape taillée dans un tissu coûteux est ornée de sceaux de pureté composés de prières implorant le salut pour les justes.
languages.original_text: This cloak made of expensive fabric is adorned with purity seals bearing prayers of salvation for the righteous.

traits.locale_text: Cette cape taillée dans un tissu coûteux est ornée de sceaux de pureté composés de prières implorant le salut pour les justes.

languages.text: 高価な布で作られたこの外套には、正しき者たちの救済を祈る純潔の印章が施されている。
languages.original_text: This cloak made of expensive fabric is adorned with purity seals bearing prayers of salvation for the righteous.

traits.locale_text: 高価な布で作られたこの外套には、正しき者たちの救済を祈る純潔の印章が施されている。

languages.text: Pahalı kumaştan yapılmış olan bu pelerin, inançlılar için kurtuluş duaları barındıran saflık mühürleriyle süslenmiş.
languages.original_text: This cloak made of expensive fabric is adorned with purity seals bearing prayers of salvation for the righteous.

traits.locale_text: Pahalı kumaştan yapılmış olan bu pelerin, inançlılar için kurtuluş duaları barındıran saflık mühürleriyle süslenmiş.

languages.text: Esta capa, hecha de un tejido costoso, está adornada con sellos de pureza que ofrecen plegarias de salvación para los justos.
languages.original_text: This cloak made of expensive fabric is adorned with purity seals bearing prayers of salvation for the righteous.

traits.locale_text: Esta capa, hecha de un tejido costoso, está adornada con sellos de pureza que ofrecen plegarias de salvación para los justos.

languages.text: 这件斗篷由昂贵的布料制成，装饰着纯洁印记，上面写满了祈祷正义之人获得救赎的祷文。
languages.original_text: This cloak made of expensive fabric is adorned with purity seals bearing prayers of salvation for the righteous.

traits.locale_text: 这件斗篷由昂贵的布料制成，装饰着纯洁印记，上面写满了祈祷正义之人获得救赎的祷文。

languages.text: Dieser aus einem teuren Stoff hergestellte Mantel ist mit Reinheitssiegeln versehen, die Erlösungsgebete für die Rechtschaffenen enthalten.
languages.original_text: This cloak made of expensive fabric is adorned with purity seals bearing prayers of salvation for the righteous.

traits.locale_text: Dieser aus einem teuren Stoff hergestellte Mantel ist mit Reinheitssiegeln versehen, die Erlösungsgebete für die Rechtschaffenen enthalten.
